title: How to write a letter to a headmaster to request a mark list for new school admission - Quora

response.answer_text: The principal ……………….. ……………….. Date Subject Marksheet required for getting admission Sir I want to seek your kind notice towards me , as I need my marksheet to get myself enrolled in a new school , I have spent very important part of my life with you all and have inculcated many good things from you all , I will always be missing my favourite school , But as we all know I will have to leave this school to complete my studies and for that I need my marksheet Looking forward for a quick reply Thank you Yours obediently ………………….
